   â–€ â–„ RELEASE NOTES                                                      â–€â–„
 â–„â–„â–€                                                                       â–â–ˆâ–ˆâ–„
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ This War of Mine: The Little Ones explores the hardships of wartime     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ survival as seen from an entirely new perspective?that of a child. This â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival,      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.          â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ This War of Mine: The Little Ones:                                      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ - Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine                  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ - Protect innocent children                                             â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ - Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need            â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ - Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children                   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ - Support the War Child charity simply by purchasing the DLC            â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
